name: Blue Airways, Inc
about: At Blue Line Aviation, we are dedicated to training the next generation of pilots with a focus on proficiency, safety, and an appreciation for the miracle of flight. Our rigorous training programs, modern fleet, and meticulous maintenance standards are aligned to help future aviators take to the skies safely and confidently. We operate under Part 141 regulations with FAA examining authority, ensuring accelerated training without compromising quality. Our team, led by founder and CEO Trey Walters, a decorated veteran and former police officer, brings a structured and professional approach to flight training. With financing options available and a commitment to our core values of safety, innovation, integrity, excellence, and accountability, we are the ideal choice for aspiring pilots. Join us and embark on a journey to mastery in the skies.
